title: The Best 5 Senses Gift Ideas for Your Husband or Boyfriend

steps.title: Cologne
steps.content: Cologne What’s better than a man that smells good? If your partner has a particular scent that they love and they’re running low, pick him up a bottle of cologne to wow him with his favorite smell.

steps.title: Shower gel
steps.content: Shower gel Fancy shower gel will remind him of you every time he’s in the shower. Grab a bottle of shower gel that you know he likes, and throw in a bar of soap , too. [1] X Trustworthy Source American Psychological Association Leading scientific and professional organization of licensed psychologists Go to source

steps.title: Lotion
steps.content: Lotion We love a man who moisturizes. Pick out a scented lotion that your guy will like, then put a bow on it to make it look pretty. [2] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Business Review Online and print journal covering topics related to business management practices Go to source

steps.title: Aftershave
steps.content: Aftershave If your partner shaves, he probably uses aftershave to soothe his skin. Buy him a nice bottle that smells great as a way to show you care.

steps.title: Beard oil
steps.content: Beard oil Beard oil keeps your guy’s beard soft and smooth. If your partner has a beard that he’s proud of, buy him some beard oil to keep it in tip top shape.

steps.title: Car air freshener
steps.content: Car air freshener Is he a car guy? If so, he’ll probably appreciate an air freshener he can smell on long drives. Grab him a scent that you know he likes so he can hang it on his rearview mirror. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Deodorizer
steps.content: Deodorizer Activated charcoal deodorizers are great to use in a gym bag or a locker. Since they absorb smells and sweat, they’ll keep your man’s gym clothes smelling good, even after a long workout session.

steps.title: Essential oils
steps.content: Essential oils Relaxing essential oils are great for unwinding after a tough day. Grab your man some oils along with a diffuser that he can use at home.

steps.title: Candle
steps.content: Candle Normal candles are great, and sexy or naughty candles are even better. Grab one that you can light whenever it’s time to take things to the bedroom.

steps.title: Fuzzy slippers
steps.content: Fuzzy slippers Who doesn’t love a cozy pair of slippers to wear in the morning? If your man is missing some comfort for his feet, grab him a nice pair of slippers or socks so he can feel the luxury.

steps.title: Sweatpants
steps.content: Sweatpants A cozy pair of sweatpants or a full sweatsuit is sure to make your partner smile. Get them in his favorite color so he’ll wear them around the house or to run errands in. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Underwear
steps.content: Underwear Does your guy wear boxers or briefs? Or maybe boxer-briefs? Elevate his underwear situation with some satin boxers .

steps.title: Robe
steps.content: Robe If your guy doesn’t have a luxury robe to lounge around in, he’s missing out. Splurge and buy him a fuzzy robe, and get yourself a matching one , too!

steps.title: Hat
steps.content: Hat A new beanie or baseball cap is sure to make your man smile. Buy him one in his favorite color or with his favorite sports team on it.

steps.title: Massage pillow
steps.content: Massage pillow A massage pillow is the perfect relaxation tool. Splurge for a massage pillow or even a massage gun to give your partner the taste of luxury right at home.

steps.title: Stress ball
steps.content: Stress ball Who doesn’t get stressed out from time to time? Buy your guy a stress ball that he can squeeze whenever work gets a little tough.

steps.title: Beard trimmer
steps.content: Beard trimmer Touching your guy’s stubble might get a little rough. Buy him a new beard trimmer so he can keep his facial hair looking snazzy.

steps.title: Multitool
steps.content: Multitool Every guy needs a multitool they can keep in their pocket. Buy him a tool that has it all: a knife, a wrench, and even a screwdriver.

steps.title: Weighted blanket
steps.content: Weighted blanket Keep your man cozy and warm with a soft weighted blanket . He’ll love the gentle pressure it provides as he floats off to dreamland.

steps.title: Framed photo
steps.content: Framed photo Pick out the perfect frame , then add a photo of you two inside. He’ll have a cherished memory to display in your home together.

steps.title: Digital photo frame
steps.content: Digital photo frame Can’t choose your favorite couples pic? Now you don’t have to! Buy your guy a digital photo frame , then upload the photos that you like. He can set it up in his office or game room to watch a cute slideshow of your relationship.

steps.title: Sunglasses
steps.content: Sunglasses If it’s summer time, your guy might need some new sunglasses . Pick out a pair you know he’d like so he can look cool while protecting his eyes from the sun.

steps.title: Blue-light blocking glasses
steps.content: Blue-light blocking glasses If your man looks at a screen a lot during the day, some blue-light blocking glasses can help him avoid headaches and tired eyes. Pick out some frames that fit his style aesthetic, then let him know that he can wear them while working at the computer all day.

steps.title: Book
steps.content: Book Is your guy an avid reader? If so, he might be hoping you snag the next novel in the series he’s reading. Go online or to a bookstore and snag a book from his favorite genre or author.

steps.title: Handwritten letter
steps.content: Handwritten letter What’s better than a love note from your sweetie? Sit down and write him a love letter telling him everything you appreciate about him. Then, watch him smile as he reads it along with his other gifts.

steps.title: Binoculars
steps.content: Binoculars Does your man enjoy bird watching? Or, maybe he’s an avid hunter. If your guy is outdoorsy, a new set of binoculars is sure to make him happy.

steps.title: TV
steps.content: TV Want to go big for this special occasion? Splurge and buy your guy a new TV that he can watch all day. He’ll love streaming his favorite movies and TV shows on a brand new television set.

steps.title: Computer monitor
steps.content: Computer monitor Maybe your man likes to play PC games or scroll on the internet for hours. If so, he might enjoy a new computer monitor for his setup.

steps.title: Lingerie set
steps.content: Lingerie set While a lingerie set is technically for you, he gets to see it on you, right? Pick out a new set of lingerie or underwear that you love, then promise to wear it for him later that night. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Headphones
steps.content: Headphones Help him listen to his favorite music on the go. Get your guy a new pair of headphones or earbuds so he can jam out all day. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Movie
steps.content: Movie We know, we know—technically, you watch a movie, right? But you also listen to it, too. Grab him his favorite movie on DVD, or stream it from your favorite streaming service. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Speakers
steps.content: Speakers Does your guy love to blast music in the house? Maybe he needs a new bluetooth speaker that he can take with him on the go. Pick him up a nice speaker so he can listen to music or podcasts out loud.

steps.title: Wireless microphone
steps.content: Wireless microphone Is your guy a streamer? Does he talk to his friends online? If so, he might appreciate a new wireless microphone for his setup.

steps.title: Record player
steps.content: Record player Maybe your partner is more of a vintage guy. If so, buy him a record player so he can play his vinyls at home. And if he already has one, a few new records are a great option, too.

steps.title: Musical instrument
steps.content: Musical instrument If your partner is musically talented, he might be hoping for a musical instrument to keep practicing with. Get him a drum kit , a keyboard , a guitar , or a bass so he can make music at home.

steps.title: Playlist
steps.content: Playlist Make him a custom playlist to show him how much you care. Hop onto Spotify , Apple Music , or YouTube to create a playlist that reminds you of him, then send him the link when you give him his other gifts.

steps.title: Concert tickets
steps.content: Concert tickets Is there a band that your partner is obsessed with? Check out their website to see if they’re touring anytime soon. If they are, snag 2 tickets for you and your boo to surprise him with a fun event.

steps.title: White noise machine
steps.content: White noise machine Does your man have trouble sleeping? If so, a white noise machine will help lull him into a gentle slumber all night. Get him a small one he can keep on his nightstand for easy access.

steps.title: Wind chimes
steps.content: Wind chimes Wind chimes add ambiance to any outdoor space. If you and your partner enjoy spending time out in the yard or your garden, get him some wind chimes as decoration.

steps.title: Candy
steps.content: Candy Does your guy have a sweet tooth? If so, he’ll love it if you grab him his favorite candy . Get something sour and something chocolate-y to satisfy his cravings. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Mug
steps.content: Mug Who doesn’t love drinking their morning coffee or tea out of a cute mug ? Buy him a mug with his favorite character or phrase on it so he can sip out of it every day. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Beer glass
steps.content: Beer glass Pint glasses are great for pouring a cold glass of beer after a long day. If your partner enjoys a beer every now and then, elevate his drink with a nice glass or a coozie. Or, go all out and buy him a bottle of liquor instead.

steps.title: Beer fridge
steps.content: Beer fridge Give your guy a nice, cool place to store his drinks in his man cave. Grab him a beer fridge that will fit right next to his favorite chair for the ultimate relaxation spot.

steps.title: Energy drinks
steps.content: Energy drinks Does your guy drink a lot of energy drinks throughout the day? Or, maybe he’s more of a coffee guy. Buy him a couple of his favorite caffeinated beverages to keep him awake all day.

steps.title: Cheese board
steps.content: Cheese board Your guy will love a cheese board where he can display his favorite snacks. Bonus points if you get some cheese and crackers to go along with it!

steps.title: Cookie cutters
steps.content: Cookie cutters Does your partner like to bake? If so, grab him some cookie cutters or cake pans that he can use in the kitchen.

steps.title: Grilling spices
steps.content: Grilling spices If your partner is a fan of grilling or smoking meats, he’s sure to love a variety pack of spices . Pick out the flavors that he’ll like to wow him with your attention to detail.

steps.title: Novelty pizza cutter
steps.content: Novelty pizza cutter Do you two eat a lot of pizza? If so, grab him a funny pizza cutter that he can use to slice up your favorite pies.

steps.title: Restaurant gift card
steps.content: Restaurant gift card Get a date night going with a gift card to your partner’s favorite place to eat. Put enough on there for the two of you, then take him out for a nice dinner. [10] X Trustworthy Source Greater Good Magazine Journal published by UC Berkeley's Greater Good Science Center, which uses scientific research to promote happier living Go to source

steps.title: Brewery tour
steps.content: Brewery tour If your partner drinks a lot of beer, take him to check out a local brewery nearby. Sign up for one of the tours to get the full experience and see how the beer is made.
